Paragraph: Consistent with the observed homogeneous donor : acceptor network with the smallest rms roughness , the PffBB-14 - based device exhibited the highest J sc of 16.77 mA cm^-2 and FF of 64.36% , suggesting efficient charge dissociation and transport.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-14 |

The material name in the paragraph is "PffBB-14".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-14 |

The only material name mentioned in the paragraph is "PffBB-14". The other entities mentioned, such as "donor" and "acceptor," do not refer to material names, so they have been removed.
